title: 17 Comfy Things You Can Wear Around The House But Also Go Out In, If You Absolutely Have To
text:
House clothes. We all have ’em, but usually they’re “yuck trackies I’ve owned since 2002 when I was 8” or “weird pyjamas with holes in them”. I’m here to tell you – treat yourself. Invest in some self-care house clothes you could legitimately wear out in public and not look unhinged doing so.

This doesn’t necessarily mean you have to spend a fortune – although what did I say about treating yourself – but it does mean matching (at least a bit) and buying things that feel nice when you wear them. I don’t mean nice like warm-blankie nice, I mean you feel pulled together in these threads.

See also: good things to wear if you work from home, things to wear if you live in a sharehouse and have a crush on your housemate, things to wear when your new bf/gf is coming over and you’re not ready to reveal your full grot self yet. Versatility, baby!
